title: EET Fuels secures $650 million financial facilities
description: EET Fuels, owner of the Stanlow refinery in the UK, has secured $650 million in financing and trade credit, bolstering its efforts to reduce emissions by 95% by decade-end through industrial carbon capture and blue hydrogen. This funding reflects strong market confidence in the company's decarbonization strategy.
